page_content: The page discusses the types of accounting methods for self-employed individuals for tax purposes.
The page outlines the requirements for a bank's tax directory, including the types of information that must be included.
The page provides information on tax-deductible transportation costs for private vehicles used for commuting.
The page discusses the tax-deductible contributions to the 3a pillar of the Swiss pension system.
The page informs about traffic disruptions in the Canton of Bern due to the 84th Tour de Suisse cycling event.
